comments:
Build 20020601

- in a self-hosting workspace with all plugins as binary except org.eclipse.ui 
and its examples and tests,
- did a text search for "systemProperty" (without the quotes)
- it found:
ActionExpression.java - org.eclipse.ui/Eclipse UI/org/eclipse/ui/internal
ActionExpressionTest.java - org.eclipse.ui.tests/Eclipse UI 
Tests/org/eclipse/ui/tests/internal (2 matches)

- double-clicking on either file would not open it
- Go to File works

I had other files open when I first did this.
Closing them did not fix the problem.

The .log contained many cases of:

Tried:
- close all perspectives
- open Java perspective
- do the search again

This time I could double-click OK.
this NPE is in an area we changed for 2.0 - have to investigate
*** Bug 19168 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
according the API spec getAncestor can return null.
*** Bug 19196 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 19198 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Dani pls prepare a patch, we are getting many reports on this one.
*** Bug 18746 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Problem are the Java search action which still listen to changes.
Replacing the existing action group with the new one does not work for actions
which are not fully protected.

Fix is to uninstall the action group before changing the input.
*** Bug 19444 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 18622 ***
